  • Method Details

    • symType

      public int symType(char type)
      A method for determining the type of character
      Parameters:
      type - is a char that have to be parsed
      Returns:
      the name of the group depending on the character type. Calls symOther(character ) by default

    • processSymbol

      public void processSymbol(char charToProcess)
      A method that processes each character depending on its type
      Parameters:
      charToProcess - is a char that have to be processed

    • processSuspendedSymbols

      public void processSuspendedSymbols(char SuspendChar)
      A method that handles a stuck character
      Parameters:
      SuspendChar - is a Suspended Symbol

    • priority

      public int priority(char selectedSym)
      A method that determines the priority of an operation
      Parameters:
      selectedSym - is a current operator
      Returns:
      1 if operator is + or - or 2 if operator is * or /

    • precedes

      public boolean precedes(char a, char b)
      A method that determine if the current special character is preceded or not
      Parameters:
      a - is a first symbol
      b - is a second symbol
      Returns:
      false/true depending on location on the stack

    • symOther

      public int symOther(char currentSym)
      A method that checking for foreignness of the current symbol
      Parameters:
      currentSym - is a current char
      Returns:
      an integer depending on the result of the function

    • nextOper

      public void nextOper(char currentSym)
      A method that prints current symbol
      Parameters:
      currentSym - is a current char

    • nextOther

      public void nextOther(char otherSym)
      A method that handles foreign characters
      Parameters:
      otherSym - is a character that does not apply to brackets or operators

    • compile

      public void compile(char[] symbolsToCompile)
      A method that processes each character from the expression entered by the user
      Parameters:
      symbolsToCompile - array of characters
